applying cash receipts to Cash Receipt Application
section.para: To apply a Cash Receipt to an individual open A/R Item, select the APPLY button. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: You will not be able to post a Cash Receipt if the amount applied is greater than the Cash Receipt total.

section.para: When applying a Cash Receipt to an individual open Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the Customer Number of the Customer selected on the previous screen. The Customer name and billing address will also display. Select the "?" symbol to view Customer information for the specified Customer.
Displays the Document Number associated with the Item.
Displays the Document Type of the Document.
Displays the Document's origination date. In the case of a Sales Order, the Document date is the date when the Sales Order is created.
Displays the date payment is due. In the case of a Sales Order, billing terms are defined in the Sales Order master.
Displays the amount due for the open Item.
Specify the Cash Receipt amount to apply to the open Item. You may not apply more than the open amount.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without applying a new Cash Receipt, returning you to the application desktop.
Applies the Cash Receipt to the open Item.
